abstract: Long's Jewelers chain in Boston area partnered two years ago with longtime supplier Ritani, move that tackled common problem among small businesses that look to balance e-commerce and retail; customers who order rings from Ritani can review purchases at Long's stores, which takes commission on products sold in area and gets added benefit of new customers visiting its stores.
lead_paragraph: The Ritani jewelry company has developed partnerships with the stores it supplies, in the latest example of melding online and in-store advantages.
snippet: The Ritani jewelry company has developed partnerships with the stores it supplies, in the latest example of melding online and in-store advantages.

headline.main: An Online Jeweler Creates Links With Brick-and-Mortar Shops
headline.print_headline: An Online Jeweler Creates Links With Brick-and-Mortar Shops
